law.text: The provisions of KRS 56.030 do not apply to land or interest in land or easements thereon partly or wholly paid for out of state funds used in the construction, alteration, or development of public airports in the state.
law.history: Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 74. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 12.
